DataElement.preferredName: Recurrent Disease Other Organ Present Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response for the presence of the return of a disease after a period of remission in a macroscopic anatomic structure different than the ones previously specified.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The return of a disease after a period of remission._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._A unique macroscopic (gross) anatomic structure that performs specific functions.  It is composed of various tissues.  An organ is part of an anatomic system or a body region.  Representative examples include the heart, lung, liver, spleen, and uterus._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The return of a disease after a period of remission.

Concepts.definition: The return of a disease after a period of remission.

Property.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:A unique macroscopic (gross) anatomic structure that performs specific functions.  It is composed of various tissues.  An organ is part of an anatomic system or a body region.  Representative examples include the heart, lung, liver, spleen, and uterus.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

A unique macroscopic (gross) anatomic structure that performs specific functions. It is composed of various tissues.  An organ is part of an anatomic system or a body region. Representative examples include the heart, lung, liver, spleen, and uterus.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A coded numeric response for 1 (No) and 2 (Yes) in answer to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.
